name: Elementor Designer Lite
author: Zulfikar Nore

sections.description:
Elementor Designer: A designer/themer’s companion. Showcase your designs in style and allow users to preview before buying/downloading – EDD integrated!

If you are a designer, themer or a website developer who needs to showcase your creation using Elementor then this plugin is for you.

This is an addon to Elementor Page Builder which must be installed and activated first.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
• Nothing Yet

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
